"No way, bitchwheat!" Hell Drak yelled, rolling and firing two lazer discs =
at Shokaract.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Roland the Last Gunsl=
inger 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 =
11:52 PM
  Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


  It hit Shokaract. EXPLO=
DE! Somehow, the language woke Shokaract from his trance, not the missile. =
He transformed into robot mode and beckoned Hell Drak to come closer with a=
 movement of his hand...

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: Testi=
fier: Abyssian Badass 
    To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Wednesday,=
 September 12, 2001 11:19 PM
    Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract


   =
 Hell Drak avoided the missile.

    "Not this time, fucko!" Hell Drak yell=
ed, firing a lazer back at Shokaract.
      ----- Original Message ----- 
 =
     From: Roland the Last Gunslinger 
      To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  =
    Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 9:53 PM
      Subject: Re: Attack!/=
Orion/Shokaract


      The lasers his Shokaract all 4 times, but he didn't=
 seem to notice, he was fixated on some thing only he could see, something =
from his own mind. Ahh! PSYCHO! Shokaract fires a single missile back at He=
ll Drak...

        ----- Original Message ----- 
        From: Testifier: =
Abyssian Badass 
        To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
        Sent: Wednesda=
y, September 12, 2001 9:29 PM
        Subject: Re: Attack!/Orion/Shokaract
=


        ::Headshot/Hell Drak/Triggerhappy::

        Headshot ducked by a=
 tree.  One of Orion's shots nailed him in the side.

        "Ah, f***!!!!=
!!!" Headshot yelled, holding his side in pain, getting up from being knock=
ed down.

        Headshot climbed up into the tree, and fired a sniper sho=
t at Orion.  Headshot was standing up, so, if he was hit......(hint hint!)
=
        ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
        Hell Drak was hit by the two missiles.  She=
 went flying back into a wall.  Hell Drak fired 4 lazers at Shokaract.
    =
    ~~~~~~~~
        Triggerhappy flew out of the way of Orion's shots.  Tr=
iggerhappy flew down, attempting to ram right into Orion!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!=
!!!!!!!

of Service.

rms of Service.

erms of Service. 


  Your use of Yahoo! Groups is subject to the Yahoo! Te=
rms of Service.
